text: Ne shebaboolelanga mbu endi nende ebiachi bia Nyasaye tawe, nohomba mbu esie ndamanya amakhuwa kefisile, nohomba shemboola mbu “esie endi Malaika tawe” nohomba shemboola mbu: “balia abababusinjiamwo tsimoni mbu Nyasaye shalabahelesia obulayi tawe.” Nyasaye niye umanyile muno akali mumioyo chiabu(nemboola endio) Toto nditsa okhuba mubandu abamabii
